reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress pretty, comfortable, and flattering, with one mentioning it works well with both flats and heels. The length receives mixed feedback, with some finding it true to size while others say it's unflattering. The material quality and value for money also get mixed reviews - while some praise the quality, others find it cheaply made, and while some consider it worth the money spent, others say it's not worth the price. The dress is very sheer and made of thin fabric. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Luxury
items.body: So beautiful, fabric was excellent quality, felt very expensive and luxurious!! So so comfortable and easy to wear! The fit is perfect I wore it all day for my babyshower and even after cleaning up and hanging out because it was so lightweight and comfy! Read more
items.author: Catherine Figueroa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty
items.body: I'm 5'10, 145 lbs pre pregnancy and around 177 lbs in the picture at 34 weeks pregnant. I got a medium. Dress is super pretty and was comfy but the top did keep riding up which was annoying. I'm a 36D and could have used more coverage but whatever. It's a little sheer too. Is it worth the price? Honestly the fabric isn't in my opinion. It doesn't look cheap or anything but it doesn't feel luxurious. You're paying for the cut. I have a really long torso and I haven't found any other drop waist dresses that go this low which is really flattering for pregnancy. Read more
items.author: Rebecca

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pink Dress
items.body: I got so many compliments on this dress the only down fall was that it was very see through! You will need to wear a slip underneath. It’s true to size and provided a good stretch Read more
items.author: Rileigh Daniels

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Completely see-through very thin fabric
items.body: Purchased for my baby shower, but was completely see-through! Had to return unfortunately :( too expensive to be see-through, the fabric was so thin. Was stretchy and beautiful otherwise! No way you could wear without a bra. Read more
items.author: Ireland

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!
items.body: LOVE this dress so much Size down Beware it’s hand wash only and the dress is very long (I’m 5’4”) and I kept stepping on it and not sure how to get those stains out! The top just folds so arm movement is limited unless you want to keep pull down/folding over. I didn’t mind because sometimes it’s just fashion over function but it really is a great dress and comfortable otherwise. Read more
items.author: T

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and flimsy material, you've been warned!
items.body: The only reason this isnt onw star is because my expectations were already low. So when the dress arrived awkwardly made with cheap, flimsy, see through material, I wasn't shocked. However, i did buy this on sale (DO NOT buy this full price) and with the intention of wearing it as a housework/ running errands outfit so its sloppy design doesnt bother me as much. Overall, if you are buying this with the hopes of a simple chic dress for a special event please please PLEASE dont waste your money on full price. P.S this is not short girl friendly. The skirt lengh is fine but it has a very long torso. Great if your pregnant, poor fit for anyone else. Read more
items.author: Gabryel Williams

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cute, but the apricot color is very see-through
items.body: The dress is cute and the style is flattering, but the apricot color I got is very see-through. I had to be careful about what I wore underneath, which was disappointing. It’s still wearable, but not as practical as I expected. Read more
items.author: Billy S

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for My Waterfall Maternity Shoot!
items.body: I wore this dress for my maternity shoot at a waterfall, and it was absolutely perfect! The fit was incredibly flattering and comfortable, even at 8+ months pregnant. The fabric flowed beautifully in the breeze and looked stunning against the natural backdrop exactly the dreamy, ethereal look I was going for. The material is soft and stretchy, with just enough weight to drape nicely without feeling heavy. It highlighted my bump in the most elegant way, and the photos turned out magical. I received so many compliments! Highly recommend this dress for any maternity shoot, especially outdoors. It made me feel beautiful and confident everything a mama to be could want! Read more
items.author: Mera

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Rose Quartz, Tan, Butter, Blue Multi, Light Sage, Coffee, Oatmeal, Olive, Soft Grey, Navy, Porcelain, Soft Blue, Black Velvet, Tangerine. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
